names.english: protect the heart and reduce fat decoction
names.commonEnglish: Protect the Heart and Reduce Fat Decoction

actions: Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, nourishes the Blood and calms the Spirit.
Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, nourishes the Blood and nourishes Jing.
With Sang Ji Sheng, tonifies Kidney Yin and Liver Blood to nourish the sinews and bones and treat dizziness, blurred vision.
Relieves Heat, generates fluids, raises Spleen Yang and alleviates symptoms of hypertension.
Tonifies Liver and Kidney Yin and nourishes the Blood.
Tonifies Spleen Qi, nurtures Stomach Yin, tonifies the Kidneys and strengthens Jing.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.

syndromes: Liver and Kidney Yin Deficiency with Spleen Qi Deficiency and Heart Blood Stasis

symptoms: Low back and knees sore and painful
Four limbs feel tired and heavy
Abdominal and epigastric distention after eating
Stabbing pain in the anterior region over the Heart
Maybe drawing pain down the internal aspect of arm (especially the left arm)
Pain (in chest and/or arm) tends to be severe and intermittent
manifestations.tongue: Dark red with purple spots or Purple body or Pale and flabby - may have teethmarks or Red
manifestations.pulse: Minute (scarcely perceptible) and thready or Knotted or Even, forceless and deficient or Thready and rapid
